bibl.title: with contributions by Olaf E. KAPER and Helen V. WHITEHOUSE, and an Appendix by Olaf E. KAPER, The Excavations at Ismant el-Kharab from 2000 to 2002.
assisted by Bruce E. PARR, The Oasis Papers 3. Proceedings of the Third International Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project
bibl.author: HOPE, Colin A.

bibl.note: Dakhleh Oasis Project, 2000-2002. - Pp. 257 et 254-255, fig. 45 + fac-sim.: 24 fragments d'une ou peut-être de 2 inscriptions grecques (commémoration de la construction d'une tombe); - 282 et 279-280, figg. 69-70 + fac-sim.: étiquette fixée à la momie de Senpsais (antérieure au début du IIIe siècle p.C.).
HOPE Colin A., with contributions by Olaf E. KAPER and Helen V. WHITEHOUSE, and an Appendix by Olaf E. KAPER, The Excavations at Ismant el-Kharab from 2000 to 2002.

Gillian E. BOWEN and Colin A. HOPE (Edd.), assisted by Bruce E. PARR, The Oasis Papers 3. Proceedings of the Third International Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project = Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 14 (Oxford, 2003) pp. 207-289, 72 figg., fac-sim., profils, plans.
